content: Yes, Twente's traditional music and dance are often performed during local festivals and cultural events, such as the Twentse Esuitvoering, which showcases traditional Twente songs and dances. Other events include the Deventer Op Stelten festival and the Stift Festival, which often feature performances by local musicians and dancers. In addition, there are several folk music and dance groups in the region who perform regularly at local pubs and cultural centers.
